channel.title: SoulScape X v2 Team 614 or 317
channel.description:
Hello this is evilbob i was the owner of soulscape with 20players online withn a week.
i am starting a new source and client i expect to go far with this
staff i need at the moment. Hoster [must know how to how host a rsps and a website. [for webclient] Webmaster [must know html and bw active. Devloper [must know how to code interfaces,animations,gfx basicly everything with pi base.
Im not sure to either make a [614] or a [317]
What does the 317 have? it has: PVP Armours Donatorcape WaterCape [custum] overload [potions] stable client [can hold up to 100+players with no promblem. perfect commands (easly add webclient and webcleint to server i juse need the hoster...) DonatorZone [fully codded]
why should i join this Team? well cause you well get a part of all donations made by players. why should i join this team? cause the owner well buy any program for coding,hosting needed [depending on donations]
If u have a good source and i like it we can take a look at it and host it..
add me on msn voidtanker@live.com
[img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/5434/soulscapeloginbanner.jpg[/img]

item.title: SoulScape X v2 Team 614 or 317
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“black birds0, post:1, topic:384211”]Hello this is evilbob i was the owner of soulscape with 20players online withn a week.

i am starting a new source and client i expect to go far with this

staff i need at the moment.
Hoster [must know how to how host a rsps and a website. [for webclient]
Webmaster [must know html and bw active.
Devloper [must know how to code interfaces,animations,gfx basicly everything with pi base.

Im not sure to either make a [614] or a [317]

What does the 317 have?
it has:
PVP Armours
Donatorcape
WaterCape [custum]
overload [potions]
stable client [can hold up to 100+players with no promblem.
perfect commands
(easly add webclient and webcleint to server i juse need the hoster…)
DonatorZone [fully codded]

why should i join this Team?
well cause you well get a part of all donations made by players.
why should i join this team?
cause the owner well buy any program for coding,hosting needed [depending on donations]

If u have a good source and i like it we can take a look at it and host it…

add me on msn voidtanker@live.com

[/quote]

You spelt custom wrong, and a client has nothing to do with the actual game engine allowing connections.
The client just accepts connections, and can take as many as you send it.

Read full topic

item.title: SoulScape X v2 Team 614 or 317
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

Evil i fixed your post now update it, you are very unorganized from what Ive seen on team viewer.

Hey, this is Evilbob Owner of SoulscapeX
I am starting With a new source and client I expect to go far with this Development,

Staff members I need,
Hoster [Taken By Smokin Flax, i need one more for a backup.]
Webmaster [Still need]
Developer [Animations, GFX’s Interfaces for the [PI] client]

What do we have?
We have,

A stable Economy
All Spirit Shields
Id say about, 95% Dragon Claws (timers Are a little off)
24/7 with no lag
Vps from OpticVPS.com

King Black Dragon
Coinshare.
Lootshare.

Staff of light.
PvP Armors
PvP Zones
NPC Clipping.
Donator Zone.
Donator Items.
Chaotic Weapons.

Pictures will come soon.

Read full topic

i could be admin tho

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:3, topic:384211”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=479972.msg3513813#msg3513813 date=1298791112]
You should work on making this thread more organized and make it look more appealing to others. Other wise, I wouldn’t expect a lot of members posting an application to join this.
[/quote]
I saw SoulScape, then saw you had posted.
I thought this was your dev :([/quote]
Haha… One thing to know about me: I never put the ‘Scape’ in my server names, and it will be a while after I create another development.

Read full topic
